sentences.en: I completely agree with that opinion. (variant 1)
That's a valid point, but there's another perspective. (variant 1)
I agree to some extent, but I have concerns. (variant 1)
I'm sorry, but I have to disagree with that proposal. (variant 1)
Let me suggest an alternative. (variant 1)
I support that idea. (variant 1)
